name: dataframe-builder
description: package used to generate sample data for charts, table, and more. dataframes are returned once the columnTypes and row count

scripts.prerelease:check: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); console.log('\nCurrent version:', pkg.version);"
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease:check && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); console.log('Will update to:', pkg.version, '\n\nPress Ctrl+C to cancel or wait 5 seconds to continue...');" && powershell -Command "Start-Sleep -Seconds 5" && npm install && npm run test && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease:check && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); console.log('Will update to:', pkg.version, '\n\nPress Ctrl+C to cancel or wait 5 seconds to continue...');" && powershell -Command "Start-Sleep -Seconds 5" && npm install && npm run test && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release:major:
npm run prerelease:check && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); console.log('Will update to:', pkg.version, '

Press Ctrl+C to cancel or wait 5 seconds to continue...');" && node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); console.log('
WARNING: This is a MAJOR version update!
Current version:', pkg.version, '

Press Ctrl+C to cancel or wait 10 seconds to continue...');" && powershell -Command "Start-Sleep -Seconds 10" && npm install && npm run test && npm run build && npm publish

author: davidinwald
